name: Azan - Burgundy - Robusto
additionalNotes:
Premium hand made cigars for daily enjoyment and perfect to share with friends. A medium taste cigars with a selection of the finest tobaccos from Nicaragua wrapped in grande 3 and 4 naturally medium dark-brown wrapper from Ecuador, contribute to a excellent sweetness in the flavor from beginning to 
Each cigar is hand-rolled by experienced rollers, who only specialize in a particular size. The cigars are then carefully checked for quality and age in their “escaparate” (our climate controlled cedar room) for months until they’ve aged long enough to bring out the excellent taste.
